Reviews.Title: “Excellent value for money, if a bit out of the way”
Reviews.Author: A1yssa2010
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel previous reviewers stayed id expecting reading comments fair hotel changed lot id booked single double wasnt huge couple pair looking stay refurbished recently walls clean bar obviously bashed luggage carpet couple flecks bathroom ensuite extremely id spotless grouting floor tiles tad discoloured tried bathroom looking nice impossible grouting brilliant white bathroom toilet paper guest soaps bright white towels tv couldnt remote control central light red own light controlled switch easily reach bed fan radiator boy radiator little actually uncomfortably hot sometimes chair allowed dressing table desk ditto bedside table stain bed covers stain dyed spilled washes ago actual dirt spilled food covers look grotty distance nylon pill badly sheets obviously brand freshly laundered road extremely noisy night seemingly directed window morning breakfast 845am found couple disgruntled people waiting breakfast ie takeaway door staff arrived started setting didnt look exciting miss didnt bother following morning becase id own supplies cant comment actually apart proximity road suppose major difficulty bit trek tube train stations dont mind walking prepared risk missing breakfast own value stay

Reviews.Title: “The word dump doesn't describe how trulyawful this place is.”

Reviews.Content: wasnt expecting price single filthy managed sleep due effects christmas night woke 6am freezing tiny radiator stone cold cant comment breakfast left immediately home disinfectant bath ill walk stick travelodge time
